name: game=lost
description:
There was a game, but I lost it. Maybe you can help me find it again?

game=lost is a puzzle game that is played primarily through the Windows file explorer. If you feel queazy about a game creating and reading files, feel free to skip this one. All files that are read and created will be contained in the folder that you have the game in.

A word of warning, though. Due to the nature of this game, it's prone to crashing due to unexpected user input. Try to be careful and deliberate when playing, haha!

Made for Global Game Jam 2021. Theme was lost & found.  You can find the submission page here: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/lostfound-2

Thanks to my playtesters who made this game playable in the first place!
